message.content:
<teammate-message teammate_id="team-lead" summary="Why did you vote NO? Brief reason please">
ALL TEAM MEMBERS:

Follow-up: you all voted NO on "does this work need an introduction from others?" Please give your reason in 1-2 sentences. Why doesn't it need one?
</teammate-message>

input.content: The work's epistemological method is self-grounding: the author's "access argument" establishes that justification ultimately rests on what is experientially available, and the essays themselves function as philosophical experiments that produce their own evidence in the reader. A work whose core thesis is that knowledge reduces to belief and whose method is to awaken structural experiences directly in the reader does not need external authority to validate it — that would contradict the very epistemological stance the collection advances.
input.summary: Work is epistemologically self-grounding, external intro would contradict its thesis

routing.summary: Work is epistemologically self-grounding, external intro would contradict its thesis
